summary:
Senior Consultant & Project Manager specializing in offshore & onshore wind projects. With a focus on site conditions assessment, energy yield assessment, LCoE analysis, and project development, successfully delivered pre-feasibility and feasibility studies, tender support, and technical due diligence.

Strong passion for sustainable energy, Brings extensive expertise in project management, technical analysis, and business development within the renewable energy sector.

profile_positions.description:
Senior Consultant & Project Manager for offshore & onshore wind projects, mainly focused on site conditions assessment, energy yield assessment, LCoE analysis, project development, pre-feasibility and feasibility studies and tender support.
• Pre-feasability & feasibility of offshore wind in Bangladesh for Power Division Bangladesh & Asian Development Bank, Internal project manager, site suitability analysis, energy yield assessment, LCoE calculations 
• Site suitability analysis, energy yield assessment, LCoE analysis and risk analysis of the various offshore wind energy areas in India for an international developer
• Conceptual pre-feed engineering study for the 1 GW Liivi offshore wind farm in Estonia by local developer Eesti Energia. Focus on the technical concept, WTG selection, LCoE studies, cost determinations, wind yield calculations and layout optimization.
• Competition and tender analysis and LCoE analysis of the various offshore wind energy areas in Estonia for an international developer 
• High-level feasibility analysis for offshore wind development in Thailand, WTG selection, LCoE studies, cost determinations and wind yield calculations
• Buyer’s Technical Due Diligence for a 112 MW nearshore wind farm in the Netherlands, project management, full energy yield assessment
• Buyer’s Technical Due Diligence for a 11 project onshore wind portfolio in Germany, project management, full energy yield assessment
profile_positions.title: Senior Consultant | Project Manager

profile_positions.description:
The Presales team delivers technical support to the Service Sales department and the customers: On the one hand, for the aftermarket products released by PLM (Product Lifecycle Management), replying day-to-day technical questions and providing reports to evidence the improved production once features have been activated. On the other, when the organization does not have a technical solution to a customer request Presales manage the assessment, quotation, and development process, therefore bring in new customer revenue from our technical expertise. ​​​​​​​
• Aftermarket Asset Management Product Support to sales​ (AEP products, Life Extension, Maintenance Optimization, Failure Rates and Repair Cost, Compliance products).
• Direct contact with the sales and operations departments: Aligning priorities, carrying out presales' activities for the products under the product portfolio, customer meetings, identification of market requirements and trends.
• Site suitability analysis of aftermarket products, review of SCADA data for turbine performance.
• Site assessment and technical capabilities to comply with customer orders on contractual obligations from Service Technology​.
• Service Customer Order Engineering: Understand and define technical requirements of the problem, definition of deliverables, interface between Sales and Technical Teams.
• Analyze and evaluate the technical customer requests out of the contractual obligation, prepare quotation and deliveries if the request can be delivered from the region.
profile_positions.title: Presales Engineer

profile_positions.description:
Senior project consultant for renewable energy, healthcare and transport projects. Technical Due Diligence, Owner’s Engineering, Lenders’ Technical Advisory services for wind and solar projects. Leading tender proposal preparation from the beginning to the end for European Bank for Reconstruction and Development (EBRD), World Bank, Asian Development Bank (ADB), European Investment Bank (EIB), and other International Finance Institutions (IFI) funded projects in the fields of renewable energy, healthcare and transportation. project needs assessment, project budget & schedule planning, business development, strategy-making and client & partner management. Responsible for the management of all business development activities, representation of the company and relations with the clients, business relations and negotiations with local and foreign companies for partnerships, building of the consortium and collecting business intelligence according to scope of the projects. Strategy decision making in Central Asia, Middle East and Central & Eastern Europe. Creation of visioning and strategy targets for renewables, transport, healthcare, sustainability, digital transformation sectors for short & mid & long terms.
•	Renewables Sector Investment Report: Report for executive board of BTY Group, the report includes project development, planning & management, energy resource assessment, siting, legal basis & permitting in Turkey, financial modelling power purchase agreements, interconnection and construction phase.
•	Nigoza Wind Farm, 50 MW, Georgia, Proposal Manager & Wind Energy Expert
•	Atakale Wind Farm, 40 MW, Turkey, Proposal Manager & Wind Energy Expert
•	Soganli Wind Farm, 30 MW, Turkey, Proposal Manage r & Wind Energy
Expert
•	Gaziantep Solar PV Project, 15 MW, Turkey, Proposal Manager, Local Renewables Expert
•	Brasov Hospital PPP, Romania, Proposal Manager & Project Coordinator & Demand Modeler
profile_positions.title: Senior Project Consultant & Business Development Coordinator

profile_positions.description:
Preparation of Technical Due Dillegences (TDD) of more than 50 projects (more than 4,000 MW) in allover Turkey including wind measurement data analysis, and energy yield assessment. Research on long-term correction of wind measurements and quantifying the seasonal bias.
•	WINDPROSPER, "Nationwide accurate WIND PROSPEcting models foR Denmark & Turkey", Project Team Member: Analysis of on-site wind measurement of 100 sites for long-term correlation, quality control of wind measurement data, long-term correlation of measured wind data.
•	Suloglu Wind Power Plant, 66 MW, Turkey, STEAG GmbH, Wind Energy Engineer: Analysis of on-site measurement, quality control of wind measurement data, long-term correlation of measured wind data, energy yield assessment, farm layout optimization, technical support for licensing permits.
•	Baglar Wind Power Plant, 102.5 MW, Turkey, Sancak Enerji, Wind Energy Engineer: Analysis of on-site measurement, quality control of wind measurement data, long-term correlation of measured wind data, energy yield assessment, farm layout optimization, technical support for licensing permits.
•	Tender support for Clients: Technical inputs for financial models, energy yield assessment, tender documentation and tender related permits for leading investors.
•	Wind Engineering: Energy Yield Assessment using WindPro and WAsP for more than 150 projects (more than 10,000 MW) in allover Turkey as well as in Kenya, Kazakhstan and Iran, long-term correlation of measured wind data, farm layout optimization.
•	Data Analysis: Data quality check, cleaning datasets, observation of wind measurement sensor quality, monthly and annual reporting of wind measurements.
•	Design of measurement campaign: Selection of measurement location, designing and planning the wind measurement campaign, site visits for pre-measurement site inspections and mast erections for more than 25 sites in Turkey and Kenya.
profile_positions.title: Wind Engineer

profile_positions.company: Orta Doğu Teknik Üniversitesi / Middle East Technical University
profile_positions.description:
Project & Research Expert in Aerodynamics Laboratory in METU Center for Wind Energy. The Center is established by Ministry of Development with a vision “National and regional center for wind energy”.
•	LabWork: Main researcher of the Aerodynamics Laboratories, in charge of test equipment and testing procedures. Technical expert on experimental equipment purchase. Wind tunnel testing of model wind turbines and wind turbine airfoils. Calibration of anemometers
•	Analysis: Aerodynamic load and performance analysis of wind turbine rotors, Computational Fluids Dynamics (CFD) analysis
•	Design Review for Northel Energy: Design due diligence for 320 kW wind turbine, re-design of the turbine blades using QBlade
profile_positions.title: Scientific Project Expert

profile_positions.description:
•	Research on active flow control on rectangular wing tip vortices, low pressure turbine leakage flows and secondary flow physics in turbomachines. 
•	Wind tunnel testing including Constant Temperature Anemometers (CTA), multi-hole pressure probes, Particle Image Velocimetry (PIV). 
•	Data analysis and validation in PIV.
profile_positions.title: Graduate Research Assistant

profile_positions.company: Orta Doğu Teknik Üniversitesi / Middle East Technical University
profile_positions.description: •	Performing experiments of a small scale microjet engine for verifying design procedures, experimental equipment purchase and developing user interfaces for measurements using LabView.
profile_positions.title: Test Engineer

volunteer_experiences.description:
Oy ve Ötesi is a Non-Profit organization for the democratic and transparent election environment, to encourage citizens to perform ballot-watching, which is their constitutional right, and to organize them.

Bayram was the Traninig Manager for Ankara and Central Turkey region. Planned and led more than 50 trainings to more than 5000 volunteers.
